title: Fangz HD v1.11
description:
The final undead shooter arrived.

99% rejoice! Here's your chance to make the 1% pay for their sins. Shoot, slash and smash lawyers, bankers and other vampires, in beautifully hand drawn worlds, made by world renowned artist Alex Gallego.

Features:

- Incredible 2d art. Watch bloodsuckers suffer in superb detail. 
- Amazingly smooth cartoon animations. 
- 10 level campaign mode, with a riveting Michael Bay-sized story and amazing bosses. 
- Survival mode.
- Store with 17 unlockable weapons and 4 upgradeable player stats. 
- Easy to pickup, hard to master.

What's New:

You spoke and we listened. Fangz HD 1.1 has:
- Multiple difficulty levels
- New jump mechanic, that doesn't take away energy (a new stamina bar was introduced)
- No timers
- New perks (coin doubler, fat wings and bunny feet)
Please continue to support us, so that we can keep Fangz as the best game of its kind.
Update: Fangz 1.11 corrects a small glitch in the tutorial.

More info:
 <a href="
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gamewhizzes.fangzHD" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gamewhizzes.fangzHD</a>


Instructions:

1.Install APK
2.Copy 'com.gamewhizzes.fangzHD' folder to 'sdcard/Android/Obb'
3.Launch the game
